    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • showAnimalEditDialog

      public boolean showAnimalEditDialog​(Animal animal)
      Opens a dialog to edit details for the specified animal. If the user clicks OK, the changes are saved into the provided animal object and true is returned.
      Parameters:
      animal - the animal object to be edited
      Returns:
      true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise.

    • getAnimalFilePath

      public java.io.File getAnimalFilePath()
      Returns the path to the preferences file, i.e. the file that was last opened. The preference is read from the OS specific registry. If no such preference can be found, null is returned.
      Returns:
      path to preferences file

    • setAnimalFilePath

      public void setAnimalFilePath​(java.io.File file)
      Sets the file path of the currently loaded file. The path is persisted in the OS specific registry.
      Parameters:
      file - the file or null to remove the path

    • loadAnimalDataFromFile

      public void loadAnimalDataFromFile​(java.io.File file)
      Loads animal data from the specified file. The current animal data will be replaced.
      Parameters:
      file - file to open

    • saveAnimalDataToFile

      public void saveAnimalDataToFile​(java.io.File file)
      Saves the current animal data to the specified file.
      Parameters:
      file - file to save

    • setEdited

      public void setEdited​(boolean edited)
      Sets a flag to indicate if data was modified in memory
      Parameters:
      edited - set to true if data was modified

    • getEdited

      public boolean getEdited()
      Returns a flag to indicate if data was modified in memory
      Returns:
      true if modified
